author: Bardfinn
text: They use [tongue-in-cheek humour](https://www.huffpost.com/entry/daily-stormer-nazi-style-guide_n_5a2ece19e4b0ce3b344492f2) to sugar-coat their virulent racism to "make it go down easier", and prevent people from spitting it out.
